Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4211 W. BOY SCOUT BOULEVARD,SUITE 200, TAMPA, Florida, 33607, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BRP Group Inc is a United States-based insurance distribution firm. Its products include commercial property and casualty, or P&C, insurance, employee benefits insurance and personal lines insurance. The company operates its business through four segments including Middle Market, Specialty, Mainstreet, and Medicare.
